page.title: 02LIVING IN RUSHENDEN
page.content:
I like{Rushenden}because it's open and airy. You can go anywhere, like up the seawall. On the green by the mud-flats you can play football and all different kinds of games. Then there's the Fleet. You can go freshwater fishing and it's usually quiet and peaceful. You can go from the mud-flats to the seawall and it leads to the Fleet.
There is an allotment at the bottom of my house. On the fence there are lots of lizards. They are mostly pregnant. I can catch them with my hands and feed them for a while until I let them go.
